data.name: Term Deposit 3 months
data.description: Fixed term deposits offer a guaranteed rate of return on your money for the life of an investment. Choose the term or interest rate that best suits you.

features.additionalInfo: You can self-serve your day-to-day banking needs via Bank Australia's App or Internet Banking.
Early Withdrawal: If you want to withdraw your TD prior to maturity, you are required to provide 31 days' prior notice. You may incur a repayment adjustment.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Customers must be aged 13+ to open a personal Term Deposit. Customers must be aged 18+ to open a non-personal Term Deposit. To open a Term Deposit through digital channels the customer needs to be 18+.
Natural Person or In trust for a Natural Person or Non-Individual entity
Personal, Joint, Self Managed Super Fund (SMSF), Business & Trust.
Be an Australian citizen, permanent resident or have a valid Visa; or entity be registered in Australia

depositRates.additionalInfo: Interest rates expressed as annual percentage rates.
